alert.note: Alert for Central Walton; Coastal Bay; Holmes; Inland Bay; North Walton; South Walton; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 09 at 10:50AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN BAY...EASTERN WALTON...SOUTHWESTERN HOLMES AND SOUTHWESTERN WASHINGTON COUNTIES THROUGH 1130 AM EDT/1030 AM CDT/... At 1050 AM EDT/950 AM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near De Funiak Springs to 9 miles southwest of Panama City Beach. Movement was northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Panama City Beach, De Funiak Springs, Eglin Air Force Base, Union, Live Oak, Freeport, Ponce De Leon, Westville, Ebro, Seminole Hills, Cerrogordo, Gulf Resort Beach, Arrant Settlement, West Panama City, De Funiak Spring Airport, Bahama Beach, Rock Hill, Glendale, Millers Ferry, and Sunnyside. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Walton; Coastal Bay; Holmes; Inland Bay; North Walton; South Walton; Washington
